Rules.SuccessEvent: Driver Qualifies for a less restricted permit

Rules.Expression: basicInfo.age == 16 AND preReqs.visionTestPassed == true AND preReqs.driversEdPassed == true AND preReqs.hoursDrivenAffadavit >= 50 AND previousLicenseMonthsHeld.instructionPermit >= 12
